actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend by two years the termination date of the exclusion from gross income of amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend for two years from 1985 to 1987 the income tax exclusion for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend by two years the termination date of the exclusion from gross income of amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.
